newsitem.title: USA: UNIDYNE Corp acquire Hicklin Engineering.
newsitem.headline: UNIDYNE Corp acquire Hicklin Engineering.

text.p: UNIDYNE Corp said Monday that it has agreed to acquire privately-held Hicklin Engineering Inc, a leading developer and manufacturer of transmission and drive-train component dynamometers and test systems.
Terms were not disclosed, and UNIDYNE said the acquisition is expected to be closed by mid-August.

Hicklin, which posted revenues of $2.2 million in 1996, will merge with UNIDYNE's wholly owned Maxwell Dynamometers Inc subsidiary to form Maxwell Hicklin Dynamometers and Engineering Inc., based in Des Moines, said the company.
UNIDYNE designs, manufactures, sells, services and finances dynamometers, vehicle emissions testing systems, specialized electric motors and eddy-current variable speed drives and controls.
